title: Ep. 178: Schedule a Weekly Playdate with Yourself
description:
Schedule a weekly playdate with yourself, a hack for dealing with a child’s curfew,
and what are some ways to deal with the distractions of an open-plan office?
Get in touch: @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin; happiercast.com/178; 774-
277-9336.
